# Class IntentMatcher

Class for intent matching functionality. Provides methods to detect intents in user input text.

##### Index

### Methods

destroy matchIntents

## Methods

### destroy

  * destroy(): void

Cleans up resources associated with this intent matcher.

#### Returns void




### matchIntents

  * matchIntents(input: string): Promise<[IntentMatch](./primitives_intent_intent_match.IntentMatch)[]>

Matches intents in the provided input text.

#### Parameters

    * input: string

Text to analyze for intents

#### Returns Promise<[IntentMatch](./primitives_intent_intent_match.IntentMatch)[]>

Promise resolving to an array of intent matches

#### Throws

InworldError if intent matching fails
